name: Evolve and Conquer: Ad Astra Infinita
name_original: Evolve and Conquer: Ad Astra Infinita
description:
From the surface of a doomed planet where amorphous creatures fight over scarce resources, rise up, join forces and carve a path to the stars above!

Highlights:

>Challenging turn-based combat inspired by the Shin Megami Tensei series - build Limit by hitting enemies' weaknesses, then unleash devastating Transcend abilities!

>In-depth customization - take Mutagenes from fallen foes and use them to change your party members' elemental affinities and gain new attacks on the fly!

>Original soundtrack blending heavy metal with elements of orchestral and electronic music!

>Rampant abuse of technobabble that would make the developers of Master of Orion and Sword of the Stars proud!

Enjoyed the demo? Please leave a comment below, and stay tuned for regular updates!
